author: suchandradutta
body:
Update of  Phase2 Tracker Digitizer validation code :
- Detector local origin fixed ( Phase2TrackerMonitorDigi ) 
- correct interpretation of ProcessId ( Phase2TrackerValidateDigi ) 
 - changes in histogram range and addition of a few new histograms. 
 - Updated BeamTest analysis code

@delaere @boudoul @atricomi
title: Updating Phase2 Tracker Digitizer validation code
